meanings.definition: Short for carbohydrates, a macronutrient found in food that provides energy to the body.
meanings.sent1: I need to eat more carbs to have energy for my soccer game.
meanings.sent2: Most fruits and vegetables contain healthy carbs that fuel our bodies.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bicycle go to the bakery? To get some carbs for its ride!
meanings.sent4: Her positivity is like carbs for the soul, giving us the energy to keep going.
meanings.sent5: The sun is like the ultimate source of carbs, providing energy to everything on Earth.

meanings.definition: Informal term for carbohydrates, often used in reference to a low-carb or high-carb diet.
meanings.sent1: She decided to cut down on carbs to lose weight.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that reducing carbs can help improve their health.
meanings.sent3: Why did the potato break up with the bread? It wanted to try a low-carb lifestyle!
meanings.sent4: In a world full of choices, carbs stand out like a high-carb beacon of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner loaded up on carbs before the race, ready to conquer the miles ahead.
